## IDeepCloneable

Defines an entity that supports deep cloning

```csharp
public interface IDeepCloneable
```

**Namespace**
* [Vendr.Common](../)

### Methods

#### DeepClone

Deep clones an entity and all of it's child entities

```csharp
public object DeepClone()
```

**Returns**

The cloned entity as an object
